fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Blight: Basic Attack a player. If they're part of your Enemy Faction, use a Powerful attack instead.
Unholy Sense: Select exactly 3 players. Learn how many of them are part of your Enemy Faction.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, the Evil Faction with the most members will be chosen as your Enemy Faction and be notified that you're coming for them. If there's a tie, the faction is picked randomly.
- You have Basic Defense. This is upgraded to Unstoppable on the first night where an Enemy Faction member targets you with a Powerful or Unstoppable attack.
- If an Enemy Faction member targets you, you will be notified with their name.
- The Enemy Faction will have access to an additional Factional Attack each night. This one may be used alongside another night ability. If it hits you, it will bypass your Defense.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure that every member of your Enemy Faction dies before you. If the last member dies on the same night as you, it counts as a loss.
